name: Trizbort
body:
### Welcome to the Trizbort project.
Trizbort is a simple tool used to create interactive fiction.  First developed by [genstein](trizbort.genstein.net) back in 2010, he continued to update until March, 2013 when he open-sourced the code.  Fast forward to 2015 when I picked up the development and along with Andrew Schultz (focused on documentation and testing) we continue to improve this great software.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
